elements.text:
From a given angle, the sin() function returns
an inverted value of a typical sine
function. Angles in Picotron are
measured as a range of 0.0-1.0 counter-clockwise
around a unit circle.  (0.0 being to the right)

The inversion of the classic sine function is useful
since Picotron uses inverted screen coordinates,
(0,0) being top left, and (480,270) bottom right.
